abstract: Accel Partners, an early backer of Facebook and Groupon, has started a new India fund that will focus on early stage investments.
snippet: Accel Partners, an early backer of Facebook and Groupon, has started a new India fund that will focus on early stage investments.
lead_paragraph: Accel Partners, an early backer of Facebook and Groupon, has raised $155 million for a new India fund that will focus on early stage investments, the venture capital firm announced on Wednesday.

headline.main: Accel Raises $155 Million for India Fund
